fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: G!E helps to communicate the results of EU funded research projects to the European institutions, with the aim of improving policy-frameworks based on new research. This involves publication of policy-recommendations and organisation of events aimed at policy-makers, amongst other activities.
goals__remit:
Greenovate! Europe is a unique group offering a pool of more than 500 experienced innovation advisers and more than 2,000 technical experts, covering the entire innovation value chain, from research to market. 
 
We provide support at EU level to research laboratories, technology developers, companies, investors and policy-makers. In the latter case, our goal is to support and encourage the emergence of a policy-framework in which eco-innovative businesses can thrive.
